TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON Massuero , is an NORP national who lives in GPE . He was represented before the ORG by Mr F. Spagnolo , a lawyer practising in GPE .
The respondent Government were represented by their successive Agents , respectively PERSON and Mr PERSON , and by their successive co - Agents , respectively Mr PERSON and Mr PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
The applicant 's father was the owner of a flat in GPE , which he had let to ORG
In a registered letter of DATE , the applicant 's father informed the tenant that he intended to terminate the lease on expiry of the term on CARDINAL DATE .

In a writ served on the tenant on DATE , the applicant 's father reiterated his intention to terminate the lease and summoned the tenant to appear before the Rome Magistrate . By a decision of CARDINAL DATE , ORG upheld the validity of the notice to quit and ordered that the premises be vacated by DATE .
On DATE , the applicant 's father served notice on the tenant requiring him to vacate the premises .
On an unspecified date the applicant 's father informed the tenant that the order for possession would be enforced by a bailiff on DATE .

DATE and DATE , the bailiff made CARDINAL attempts to recover possession . Each attempt proved unsuccessful , as the applicant 's father was not entitled to police assistance in enforcing the order for possession .
In the meanwhile , on DATE , the applicant 's father died and the applicant inherited the flat .
On DATE , the applicant appointed a lawyer in order to be represented in the procedure with the aim of repossessing the flat .
On DATE , the applicant recovered possession of the flat outside the framework of the eviction proceedings in a meeting held between him , his lawyer and the tenant 's representative .
